name: Fighting Alone
description:
Fight by yourself, for yourself, in this simple style side-scrolling shooter game! That's right! A side-scrolling shooter WITHOUT co-op! 

This is my first game-jam game EVER! I'd like to dedicate it to the 20 redbulls I downed in order to make this thing happen in 48 hours!

Hopefully the folks up at extra credits will enjoy my work!

PS: Has some huge frame stutters on bosses, but only in HTML. Download it for the best experience.
